itemDisplayName: Deploy a VM Scale Set with Ubuntu VMs, Docker, Rancher and Auto Scale
description: This template allows you to deploy a simple VM Scale Set of Linux VMs using the lastest patched version of Ubuntu Linux 15.04 or 14.04.2-LTS. These VMs are behind a load balancer with NAT rules for ssh connections.They also have Auto Scale integrated. In addition, Docker & Rancher agents are deployed.
summary: This template deploys a VM Scale Set of Linux VMs with Docker & Rancher behind a load balancer with NAT rules for ssh connections and Auto scale integrated
